channel.title: Wierd NPC Drops (PI)
channel.description: when i open NPCdrops.cfg and i change the drops on, lets say corp. i put the sigils, blessed spirit shield and holy elexir in the drops of the monster. the problem is that it doesnt drop all that. it drops like green d hide, 500k gp, mystic mage armor, mage logs. even when i deleted all those "995 995 995 (sigil ID) (holy elexir ID) etc." thats how it is. i deleted all those 995. still the same.. HELP! its Project insanity Source. never had this problem before..

item.title: Wierd NPC Drops (PI)
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

[quote=“Leoiscool, post:8, topic:433873”][quote author=DaMatt17 link=topic=536590.msg3923905#msg3923905 date=1330007412]
Example:

2550:83 995:500000 4588:10 5697:10 11696:1

That makes it so that it drops item 11696(BGS) every 83 drops
[/quote]how do i add more items than just bgs?
And 2550 id isnt that the monsters id? And do i put the rare ids under and if i take like item id 560(death rune) 560:50 it drops 50 death runes.[/quote]

Just do it like this:

2550:83 995:500000 4588:10 5697:10 11696:1 ####:1 ####:1

That makes it so that it drops one of these items every 83 kills.
The items to the of 2550:83 are commons, graardor will drop these three things, not at the same time.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“DaMatt17, post:5, topic:433873”]Is your drop rate really low?
Besides, I recommend you put bones or something in your NPCconstans.TSM
Likes this: 1 526
That makes it so that it always drops bones.[/quote]
Any idea how you input the drop ratio/%?

item.dc:creator: @Leoiscool Leoiscool
item.description:
@Leoiscool wrote:

DaMatt17:

You have to put it in your NPCdrops.TSM

thanks… but the problem is when i compile it works fine. and then i kill the monster. now it isnt dropping anything. i have put the same ids in order in .TSM as in the .CFG files. like “995:1 11704:1” in the TSM and “995 11704” in CFG
